name: 四川工程技术学院
accountSelector: #main3Col1 > div.main3Col1Box > div > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(1) > td:nth-child(2) > input.INPUTBOX
passwordSelector: #main3Col1 > div.main3Col1Box > div > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(2) > td:nth-child(2) > input
loginBtnSelector: #main3Col1 > div.main3Col1Box > div > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(4) > td:nth-child(2) > input[type=submit]:nth-child(1)

pages.script: document.querySelector('body > table.wrui > tbody > tr > td > table:nth-child(1) > tbody > tr > td:nth-child(3) > table:nth-child(2) > tbody > tr:nth-child(2) > td > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(3) > td > div > p > a:nth-child(29)').click();

let list = document.querySelector('body > table.wrui > tbody > tr > td > div > center > table > tbody > tr > td > table:nth-child(2) > tbody');let len = list.children.length;for (let i = 1; i < len; i++) {let target = list.children[i].children[1];if (list.children[i].children[1].textContent.replace(/\s/g, '') == xq) {target.children[0].click();}}
document.querySelector('body > div > center > table:nth-child(1) > tbody > tr > td:nth-child(8) > a').click();
